name: Farrer Park MRT
description: Farrer Park MRT Station (NE8) is an underground Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station on the North East Line in Kallang, Singapore.

name: National Museum of Singapore
description: The National Museum of Singapore is a national museum in Singapore and the oldest museum in Singapore. Its history dates back to 1849 when it was started as a section of a library at Singapore Institution.

name: SMU
description: Singapore Management University is a public university in Singapore that specialises in business and management studies.

name: Lau Pa Sat
description: Lau Pa Sat is a historic building located in the heart of Singapore's financial district. Try out popular food options like Satay, Hokkien Mee and Fried Carrot Cake and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.

name: Marina Bay Sands
description: Marina Bay Sands is an integrated resort fronting Marina Bay in Singapore. It is known for its iconic three towers and the SkyPark.

name: Gardens by the Bay
description: Gardens by the Bay is a nature park spanning 101 hectares in the Central Region of Singapore, adjacent to the Marina Reservoir.
